channel.title: How to make a portal work! 317
channel.description:
ok i have a portal that i added
all i need to do is get it to teleport you to different spots
like a skilling area, training area, dragons
so like when you click on it it gives you like 4 options to pick from
can anyone help me with the codes
i need to know what to add and where to add it to

item.title: How to make a portal work! 317
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:12, topic:348197”]Well you need to add a new public void so open client.java (add the code anywhere but not in another public void)

public void portalTeleports() { changeText126("Where would you like to teleport?", 2481); changeText126("Teleport one", 2482); changeText126("Teleport two", 2483); changeText126("Teleport three", 2484); changeText126("Teleport four", 2485); sendFrame164(2480); }

Then search (Ctrl+F)

Case 13:

And add

if (objectID == PORTAL_ID) { portalTeleports(); }
Then search (Ctrl+F)

objectClick

or

clickingMost

(My server didn’t have clickingmost)
And add

[code] case 9178: //Teleport One
c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
c.sM(“You teleport to option one!”);
c.closeInterface();
break;

    case 9179: //Teleport Two
           c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
           c.sM("You teleport to option two!");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;

    case 9180: //Teleport Three
           c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
           c.sM("You teleport to option three!");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;

    case 9181: //Teleport Four
           c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
           c.sM("You teleport to option four!");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;[/code]

Hope this helped ;)[/quote]Thats the eaxct same as what Vain said.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a portal work! 317

@Opium10 wrote:

I’m getting this error.

client.java:5687: cannot find symbol symbol : variable objectID location: class client if (objectID == 2465) { ^ client.java:5688: cannot find symbol symbol : method portalTeleports() location: class client portalTeleports(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: How to make a portal work! 317
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Well you need to add a new public void so open client.java (add the code anywhere but not in another public void)

public void portalTeleports() { changeText126("Where would you like to teleport?", 2481); changeText126("Teleport one", 2482); changeText126("Teleport two", 2483); changeText126("Teleport three", 2484); changeText126("Teleport four", 2485); sendFrame164(2480); }

Then search (Ctrl+F)

Case 13:

And add

if (objectID == PORTAL_ID) { portalTeleports(); }
Then search (Ctrl+F)

objectClick

or

clickingMost

(My server didn’t have clickingmost)
And add

[code] case 9178: //Teleport One
c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
c.sM(“You teleport to option one!”);
c.closeInterface();
break;

    case 9179: //Teleport Two
           c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
           c.sM("You teleport to option two!");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;

    case 9180: //Teleport Three
           c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
           c.sM("You teleport to option three!");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;

    case 9181: //Teleport Four
           c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
           c.sM("You teleport to option four!");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;[/code]

Hope this helped

item.title: How to make a portal work! 317
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

[quote=“tubefish, post:4, topic:348197”][quote author=Music8 link=topic=444581.msg3264105#msg3264105 date=1278723370]
if it is a 317, go to client.java and get the code for it then make a new thing lol

i have an ex of my portal

ex: this is my donator portal

if (objectID == 4157) { teleEffect = 1; if(donator == 1) triggerTele(3126, 3107, 0); sM("Welcome To DeathSlay's Donater area."); sM("You Have To Be A Donator To Use This Portal"); sM("Donate At Lol Pkz.Tk"); }

ex for u:

if (objectID == id here) { teleEffect = 1; triggerTele(3126, coords, 0); }
[/quote]

where do i put the

                            if (objectID == id here)
    {
                            teleEffect = 1;
                            triggerTele(3126, coords, 0);

}

and what do i put it after?[/quote]

this is only a normal version of a portal, it will teleport u to only one place

Read full topic
